text:
="preserve">Milano Golf Club Le Rovedine, located in Milan (Opera area), is a country club. It is 7 km far from the Center of the city of Milan.
Golf Club Le Rovedine is a 650,000 square meters park, with 9-hole of difficult level 3. The 18 hole championships are open to every level of players. The 52nd Open of Italy and the 22nd Ladies Italian Open has been played there.
